name: Yomotsu-hegui
description:
Yomotsu-hegui means eating foods of the dead, and if you do that... <How to play>

　Find hints and get items with click.

<Controls>
  1. Click on the screen: get/use item, get close to specific spot.
  2. Click your item (on the top of screen): select it.
  3. Double-click your item: zoom it. (You could combine two items)
  4. Click left-right button: move to the direction.
  5. Click bottom button: return to original state.
  6. Push "W", "A", "S", "D" and use mouse: move and look. (only one part)
<Requests>
  • I'd be grateful if you could tell your thoughts on this game.
  • Please let me know if there're bugs.
